snippet: The chairman and chief executive of Vornado Realty Trust, Steven Roth, resigned from the board of J. C. Penney, the company said in a regulatory filing.
abstract: Vornado Realty Trust chairman and chief executive Steven Roth resigns from board of JC Penney.
lead_paragraph: The chairman and chief executive of Vornado Realty Trust, Steven Roth, resigned from the board of J. C. Penney, the company said in a regulatory filing.

headline.main: Head of Vornado Steps Down From J.C. Penney Board
headline.print_headline: Head Of Vornado Steps Down From J.C. Penney Board
